channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thousands attend funeral of Malian star Amadou Bagayoko
item.description: The blind musician, who helped bring Malian music to the world in the 2000s, died last week aged 70.

item.title: Myanmar fighting continues despite post-earthquake ceasefires

item.title: Stocks whipsaw in early trading as economists cite recession risks
item.description: Financial markets opened sharply lower, but abruptly reversed course despite ongoing concerns about the U.S. economy.

item.title: Watch: Deadly storm system brings flooding to US South and Midwest
item.description: Severe weather hit parts of the US as forecasters warned that swollen rivers pose a danger even after the rain stops.

item.title: Gaza air strikes follow heaviest rocket fire by Hamas in months
